duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with potential clients to assess their unique healthcare needs and financial goals, providing expert guidance on suitable health insurance options.
Present and explain health insurance plans, including coverage options, benefits, and costs, tailoring recommendations to individual client circumstances.
Assist clients with the application process, ensuring accuracy and completeness.
Act as a dedicated advocate for clients, resolving inquiries, and addressing concerns.
Stay updated on industry trends, policy changes, and new products to provide the most up-to-date information to clients.
Adhere to all relevant industry regulations and company policies.

education_certification.credential: Active Health Insurance License in the state of residence or willing to obtain one. Previous experience as a health insurance agent or related experience in the sales industry.
Proficiency in using insurance quoting software and customer relationship management (CRM) tools.
Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to explain complex insurance concepts in a clear and understandable manner.
Strong analytical skills to evaluate policy options and financial considerations.
A customer-focused mindset with the ability to build trust and rapport with clients.
